Lagos State Senior Model College Kankon bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị nke steeti dị n'okporo ụzọ Owode-Apa nke Badagry LGA, Lagos Steeti
E hiwere ya na 1988 n'oge ọchịchị ndị agha nke Rear Admiral Mike Akhigbe (Rtd).
LSMC Kankon bụ otu n'ime kọleji ise e guzobere na nke ọ bụla n'ime ngalaba ise nke Lagos Steeti
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ kwagara n'ebe ọ na-adịgide adịgide n'okporo ụzọ Owode-Apa na Nọvemba 27,  afọ 1989
E hiwere ya n'afọ 1988, ya na kọleji anọ ndị ọzọ n'okpuru nchịkwa ndị agha nke Captain [[Okhai Mike Akhigbe, onye Gọvanọ ndị agha nke steeti Lagos n'oge ahụ
Kọleji nke e guzobere ya na mmadụ anọ ndị ọzọ malitere na Government College, Ketu, Epe
Kọleji anọ ndị ọzọ gụnyere Igbonla, Badore, Meiran na Igbokuta
Site n'oge 1988 ruo 1992, e nyere kọleji ntọala dị mkpa ma lekwasị anya na ọrụ ha dị ka ndị na-aga n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ na mbọ ndị ọzọ
Onye isi ntọala maka Igbonla, Maazị James Akinola Paseda, ji okpukpu abụọ dị ka onye isi nhazi maka kọleji ise ahụ na mbido na Febụwarị 1988
Onye isi nke Kankon bụ Maazị B.O
Owoade ebe osote onye isi bụ Oriakụ
Kemgbe afọ 2003, a gbanwere aha ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ ka ọ bụrụ Lagos State Senior Model College, Kankon
Akụkụ nke obere nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ anọghịzi n'okpuru nchịkwa nke ụlọ akwụkwọ.
